website_summaries.verdict: Astro Gaming's A40 TR headset with MixAmp Pro TR is a high-quality wired gaming headset/amp combination that provides a very comfortable fit and excellent audio for a premium price.
pros: Plenty of audio customization options through the Astro Command app
cons: PS4 Slim users need an HDMI splitter

customer_reviews.title: Warning! - these didn’t work!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully packaged Very comfortable Set up is easy Even after a few days speaking to Astro we couldn’t fix the issue of no game sound. Seems to be a Mixamp fault. Even a replacement Optical Cable didn’t resolve it. For more details feel free to message me
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Baines

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price. I've always wondered whether this was all just hype. So I decided to risk the purchase and I'm not disappointed. I use this mainly for playing CoD: Warzone, and I can hear EVERYTHING. I also have the mixamp which helps, as my settings allow for footsteps to be heard clearly. I'm now never surprised by someone who may be even crouched and walking, as you can still hear steps although very very slightly. Even if these headphones are damaged (I reckon they'll last me years), I 'll be getting another. For gaming, and watching movies, and everything in between, I use these headphones. Well worth it but expensive.

customer_reviews.title: Audio bug fix

customer_reviews.title: Great Ps4 gaming headset from Astro
customer_reviews.text: Had Astro A40tr before and they are a great set of gaming headset so had no issue in ordering the newest set when my old ones had given up after 3 yrs of constant gaming. The build quality is outstanding and the sound is fantastic the ear cups cover my large ears easily and are very comfy on long gaming sessions and the pro amp is fantastic that I have complete control of game/chat at my fingertips. If you don’t mind having a wired gaming headset these are fantastic but I wanted a wireless set and went for the Astro a50 which are a little more expensive but worth the extra in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect

Very happy with my purchase.

product_meta.title: ASTRO Gaming A40 TR Wired Gaming Headset + MixAmp Pro Gen 4 for PS4 & PC - Black/Blue (with Dolby Sound)
product_meta.description: Pattern Name:PS4 + PC/MAC| Style Name:A40 + Mixamp| Colour Name:Blue / BlackAstro A40 TR Headset + MixAmp Pro TR or Playstation 4, PC and Mac is the premier audio solution for esports athletes, content creators and streamers. It meets esports athletes’ rigorous standards for audio fidelity, comfort and durability. The MixAmp Pro TR features Dolby Digital Surround Sound processing. The A40 TR arrives as an open-back headset featuring a swappable precision mic and customisable speaker tags. For loud tournament environments, the headset transforms into a closed-back, noise-isolating headset by adding a Mod Kit (sold separately) with sealed speaker tags, synthetic leather ear cushions and a voice-isolating microphone.
feature_bullets: Tuned Gaming Headset : ASTRO Audio V2 delivers pro-quality audio for gamers when they need it most, from live streaming in their living room to competitive play in the pits of a tournament
Ideal Fit and Finish : Designed for marathon gaming sessions, the A40 TR PS4headsetis lightweight, comfortable and built to last
Mod Kit Ready : Transform your A40 TR into a closed-back noise-isolating gamingheadset for loud tournament environments
Game/Voice balance : Easily balance how much game sound and voice chat you hear
ASTRO Command Center Software : Customise every input and output parameter, including personalised sound profiles and multiple mic and stream settings
